response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its immense worth to you, valued at $1,500,000, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a competitive price tailored to ensure mutual benefits. Considering the exceptional quality and potential impact of this product on your business, I propose a price of $1,350,000. This offer is designed to provide you with substantial savings while ensuring a fair return for my company. I look forward to discussing this opportunity further and exploring how we can collaborate to achieve success together.", "product_price": 1350000}
